snippet.title: Hustle City Trailer
snippet.description:
Hustle City is a story-driven, cycling game that rewards fitness, creativity and nerves of steel. Ride hot lines through city traffic as you rush to drop off packages and meet tight delivery times. Whether you visit for a day or a week, Hustle City will be your escape from a tired smart trainer routine.

We’ve built a demo and need your feedback. If we can get enough support to secure funding, we aim to release the full game in fall 2021.

Sign up to test and help shape the future of Hustle City.

www.ridehustlecity.com
